core.user

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.account.Account
      • core.user.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class User
extends Account
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a registered user using this program.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Creates an user with given username and password, all lists are default empty, isFrozen is false, city is empty, credit is 60, completedTradeWithoutEvaluation = 0.

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password)
        Creates an user with given username and password, all lists are default empty, isFrozen is false, city is empty, credit is 60, completedTradeWithoutEvaluation = 0.
        Parameters:
        username - the username for this user.
        password - the password for this user.

        public void addToBlockList(java.lang.String username)
        Adds other user's username to the user's blockList.

        Precondition: The username is not this user's username.

        Parameters:
        username - the username of the other user that this user want to block.
